description: SURESH PADMANABHAN is an author, public speaker, columnist and the creator of Money Workshop.  Earlier, he was associated with the Times of India initiative “NIE”, through which he delivered talks across major English speaking schools, to create a new awareness amongst children. His talks on money, life and spirituality have mesmerized audiences across the world. He firmly believes that materialism and spirituality can co-exist in complete harmony. For more on his works check out: www.themoneyworkshop.com
name: Suresh Padmanabhan
